summary: Five girls vie for a chance to model diva Deedee DeVille's fashion line, but they're soon competing for their lives against four mythical beings, led by the mischievous Farr Darrig.
cast: Tiffany Thornton|Seth Peterson|Charlie O'Connell|Nathan Phillips|Nikki Leigh|Alex Rose Wiesel|Masuimi Max|Peter Donald Badalamenti II|Ben Woolf|Chris MacDonnell|Katrina Kemp|Anna Sophia Berglund|Jeryl Prescott|Sophia Beetz|Bianca Figueroa|Roman Coto|Jessica Lou Allen
title: Unlucky Charms
